name: Invasion of the Mutant Space Bats of Doom
name_original: Invasion of the Mutant Space Bats of Doom
description:
Invasion of the Mutant Space Bats of Doom is an arcade game developed by Pop Software. It came out on 01-01-1994. It was published by Pop Software.
Invasion of the Mutant Space Bats of Doom is available on PC.
